captions.text: (relaxing music)

- I wonder how many planes
are flying right now?
I wonder how many people are in the air,

squirming in their seats,
sitting next to annoying people,
being annoying themselves?
I wonder where everyone's going?
Who's on their way somewhere?
Who's on their way home?
It's amazing how easy it is for everyone
to just fly somewhere.
This sandwich is both the worst
and best thing I've ever eaten.
These walkways are awesome.
Why don't we have these everywhere?
I feel like the bionic man.
What if I just got on another flight?
I could be anywhere in the world tomorrow.
Aw, shit, where's my boarding pass?
I swear it was in one of these pockets.
Did I drop it?
Maybe it was in the bathroom
or maybe I could.
I'm an idiot.
Ugh, I'm gonna have to pee on the plane.

No one ever pays attention
to the safety instructions.

What would happen if
we actually went down?

Those slides actually
look like a lot of fun.
Is it hard to fly this thing?
Like, if the pilot blacked out,

could I just jump up there
and fly us to safety?
Maybe I should learn to fly a plane.
But then where would I keep my plane?
Can a butt change shape if it's sat on
for long enough in one spot?

It's crazy that we're all
just in this metal tube

shooting through the air a
million miles above the Earth.
We're all just falling asleep
or complaining about something.

Ah, why didn't I just pay
more for an aisle seat?
(sound of baby crying)
Ugh, here we go.
relaxing music)
(sound of baby crying)
(whooshing noise)

title: Weird Thoughts You Might Have While Flying

and I don't like being cold.﻿

public transport. If you don't want to deal with crying babies, then pay

baby as well, so yeah, can't have your own way all the time.

comments.author: Muke As Fuck

comments.text:
+whgpqls2330 Kissing major ass with a gate agent might get you some 
upgrades....or a decent lay if you're in town again. You can have the 
blanket because we have to throw them away after one use. You ARE being 
judged when you go to the toilet because everyone knows you are gonna poop. 
Your checked baggage is in the rear bin(s) of the plane while your gate 
check baggage is in the forward bin(s). ____If you hide someone in your 
luggage they will probably die____we have to make sure that the flight deck 
knows about pets in the bin(s) on larger planes so they are supplied the 
air they need to breath. The stewardess button doesn't work half the time. 
If you try on the oxygen mask and it's not an emergency the plane will 
divert to the nearest station and you will be arrested, sued, and banned 
from that airline (same goes for sneaky smokers). AND FINALLY don't fucking 
yell at us when your flight is delayed from the previous destination, if we 
don't have a place to smoke, or when the plane has maintenance.........P.S. 
when you and 9 other people get moved to the very back of the plane it 
means we need weight in the back so the plane can actually take off without 
the risk of crashing at the end of the runway and you can consider yourself 
a hero.﻿

3. (sitting next to a guy) Oh gosh...I can't sleep. What if I sleep. What

4. (cute guy sits next to me) Please talk to me. Please talk to me. Put 
your shoulder over me. Kiss me. Now.﻿

comments.text:
My thoughts on the plane: how's the weather at the destination and 
alternate?  Those look like lenticulars, should I throw the seatbelt sign 
back on?  Those ground handlers have no hustle, how are we supposed to push 
on time when they're dragging their asses?  That flight attendant is kind 
of cute, I should find out if she's single without being 'that guy'.  
Wonder if my crew are chill or I'm going to deal with uptight people for 
the next four days.  Where should I go on my days off?﻿
